nodes.text: The Mattri Asteroid was an asteroid that once served as a location for the headquarters of Garm Bel Iblis's private, anti-Imperial resistance movement, dubbed Peregrine's Nest.

When asked about the number of bases they had used Sena replied the current one was "Fourteenth..." "...That's if you count Womrik and the Mattri asteroid bases." However, Lando Calrissian later doubted the accuracy of those statements when he realized how permanent a structure Peregrine's Nest had become. There may never have, in fact, existed such a base as the one she spoke of, or even the location.
It is also unknown if by "bases" she was referring to a single base at Womrik and a single base on the Mattri Asteroid, or if there were multiple bases in a Mattri Asteroid Field/Belt.
